Title: On the Jones
Plot: With the Barn grieving over the loss of one of their own, Vic's out to avenge his friend's murder, but finds himself in the crosshairs of Kavanaugh.  Claudette assigns the Strike Team to investigate the torching of a methadone clinic.  Meanwhile, Julien and Tina look into a robbery/assault at a porno shop, and Dutch makes a horrifying discovery in San Marcos.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb
